definition: the act of absolving or remitting
details:
noun
- the act of absolving or remitting
= synonyms: absolution
- (law) the act of remitting (especially the referral of a law case to another court)
= synonyms: remitment
- an abatement in intensity or degree, as in the manifestations of a disease
= example: an abatement in intensity or degree, as in the manifestations of a disease
= synonyms: remittal, subsidence
- a payment of money sent to a person in another place
= synonyms: remittal, remitment, remittance
